title: Completed PE Summary - Yves Marie Amil
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr Amil
Port of registry: Jersey
Flag: Channel Islands
Type: Fishing vessel
Built: 1980
Construction: Wood
Length overall: 20.
Gross tonnage: 74.42
Date & Time 21/12/04
Location of incident: Welsh coastal waters
Incident Type: Fire/Explosion
Persons onboard: 3 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damagetd> Ship lost

Synopsis

This Jersey- registered 20m wooden potting vessel caught fire in UK territorial waters. A fire was discovered in the forward space at 0400 UTC on 21 December 2004. Despite all efforts, the three crew members were later evacuated without injury onto a RNLI lifeboat. The vessel foundered later that day.

Action taken:

A Preliminary Examination was carried out by the MAIB at the request of the States of Jersey Harbours and Airport Committee. No specific recommendations were made.
